General.Name: Razor Labs Ltd
General.Description: Razor Labs operates in the artificial intelligence (AI) industry in Israel, Australia, and internationally. The company offers DataMind AI, an Software as a Service (SaaS) solution that provides actionable insights by analyzing various operational states of fixed and mobile assets, unscheduled operational downtime, and predicts malfunctions in mining industry; and Enterprise AI, an customized solution for solving organizational problems for organizations, as well as industrial organizations. Razor Labs was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
General.Address: Derech Menachem Begin 150, Tel Aviv, Israel, 6492105
